channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2276|2024-08-04T07:01:41.444Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20selection%20tasks%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Selection tasks Plugin 1.0 and earlier executes a user-specified program on the Jenkins controller, allowing attackers with Job/Configure permission to execute an arbitrary system command on the Jenkins controller as the OS user that the Jenkins process is running as.
